core:processNote.core:description: Visa SCA Online PIN is handled by VIPA which causes OnlinePINRequired to be set. For Mastercard this doesn't seem to happen, so force it here if online pin is enabled and host response code is 70.
Sets online PIN required due to SCA and sets reason in FallForwardReason so we can flag later when resending auth request.

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: Authorisation forced by configured action after online auth failure or we are performing voice referral so the ICC outcome is ignored. But never if Auth & Settle and never if Contactless.
Ignore expected Declined outcome for contactless refund

core:assignAction.core:comment: We are forcing approval when actually the ICC declined. So restore the saved ARQC.
Save the authorisation request cryptogram in case we want to force authorisation even if the ICC declines.

core:outcomeLink.core:comment: If offline mode authorisation error and action is not not forcing authorised, then default to voice referral.
Force No CVM to Signature if specified in ICC reader configuration
